Posts.Content: Oct 23, 2015 01:53AM soscaredhubby wrote: I wanted to check back in with this thread and thank you for all of your advice. We do have a LE certified physical therapist. She has been great but wants to see my wife weekly and we aren't able to do that during chemo as well. Unfortunately, my wife has developed cording on her left side, we are still hoping to avoid LE, but have heard that cording isn't a good sign. Does anyone know anything else we can do? We are trying to be careful.
Posts.Title: Lymhpedema precautions? Risk? soscaredhubby soscaredhubby
